title: List of staff networks in council since 2015

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
I would like a list of the different staff networks the council has currently, as well as what they've historically had since 2015.
I'd also like to know if any of them have chosen to fold themselves, and if so which ones and when.
Yours faithfully,
Rei Eden

Dear Rei Eden,
Thank you for your request for information relating to list of staff
networks in council since 2015 which we received on 15/02/2024.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 14/03/2024. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ

Dear Rei Eden,
Thank you for your request for information relating to list of staff
networks in council since 2015 which we received on 15/02/2024.
Please find Sheffield City Council’s response to your request set out
below:
I would like a list of the different staff networks the council has
currently, as well as what they've historically had since 2015.
We do not have the full information from 2015 but the following staff
networks below were running intermittently forming and starting until end
of 2022.
• Directorate Staff Networks – these will have had varying names over
the years due to organisational restructures.
• Disability Confident Working Group
• Carers Network
• Sheffield Race Equality Network
• Menopause Café
• LGBT+ network
• Early Careers Network
• Safe Space Race Group
• Portfolio Race Equality Challenge subgroup
• Consultation Network
• SCC Data Network
• Power BI Users Group
• GIS User group
• Have your Say Sheffield Hub
The employee networks/ hubs listed below started to set up and run in
2023:
• Disability Hub
• Menopause Café
• Neurodiversity Hub
• Care Experience Hub
• Early Careers Hub
• Pregnancy & Maternity Hub
• Race Equality Hub
• LGBT Hub
• Women’s Hub
• Staff Diversity Network Hub
• SCC Data Network
• Power BI Users Group
• GIS User group
• Directorate employee equality hubs -
• Various service specific staff networks
• Have your Say Sheffield Hub
I'd also like to know if any of them have chosen to fold themselves, and
if so which ones and when.
Please see response above.
If you have any queries about this response, please do not hesitate to
contact us.
The information provided in this response is available for re-use under
the terms of the Open Government Licence v3.0. The terms of the OGL can be
found [1]here. When re-using the information, Sheffield City Council
requires you to include the following attribution statement: “Contains
public sector information obtained from Sheffield City Council and
licensed under the Open Government Licence v3.0.”
If you are unhappy with the response you have received in relation to your
request, you are entitled to have this reviewed. You can ask for an
internal review by replying to this email. Internal review requests should
be submitted within 40 working days from the date of this response.
If you remain dissatisfied with the outcome of your internal review, you
can contact the Information Commissioner’s Office. Please see

https://ico.org.uk/make-a-complaint/offi...
for further details.
Kind Regards,
Sheffield City Council

Sheffield, S1 1UJ
